value:
Those in the church may consider
Abyss to be "filthy," but some have
no choice but to live underground.

I was meant to join the Blue Lions,
but I ended up underground. I have
my disagreements with the church.

Don't sit back and do nothing. You'll
just end up dying needlessly. That's
how it goes in my world, anyway.

I am but an insignificant and beautiful
creature. Surely there's nothing I
have to offer for your plight.

In this book, I've written down the
names of the people I've failed to
protect.$k$pI can't let myself forget them. We
share the same dream, after all.

Using me as a messenger boy...
You can't help but laugh at
$Nf's guts.
Don't forget who you're dealing with.

I'll never be satisfied.
*laughs* Who's next?

Well, that's, uh...yeah. Some days
are just like this.
Now that feels good.

I'm Yuri of the Ashen Wolves.
What need might you have of this
insignificant and beautiful creature?

Strolling through the town, I saw
no poverty or squalor anywhere
I went. Not bad place to end up!$k$pAnd the people? So friendly! Almost
foolishly so. They called out to me
as I passed, smiles on their faces.$k$pThose smiles are fragile things. If war
comes to Askr, they'll vanish in an
instant, as will these carefree days.$k$pI have no connection to this land.
But I don't want to see smiling faces
exchanged for sobbing ones.$k$pAs long as you keep fighting for
these people, so will I.$k$pI should have died of illness, but it
seems I have good luck. I'll lend
you that luck. Use it well.
ふっ
せいっ
くっ
くああああっ
You've had your fun.
Better accept it.
Step aside.
Kneel!
Just my luck...
Sigh
You can call me Yuri. You'll want to remember that.
Oh! Whatever you think you heard, I wasn't singing.
When I was young, my mother took in an elderly man. He ended up saving my life.
Are you speechless? Am I that captivating?
Helping people in need is what my gang's about.
I don't even know much about where I come from—or why I have this Crest.

I may not seem like much of a chef, but I know a
thing or two about cooking. I could make you something.
This will be fun.
Where to, friend?
I won't disappoint.
